record.name: Categorization

autoTransition.atCondition: not (same(problem.status in $L.file, "Categorize")) and not (same(problem.status in $L.file, "Assign")) and not (same(problem.status in $L.file, "Suspended"))
autoTransition.atCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Categorize</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Assign</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Suspended</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
autoTransition.atCondDesc: ( problem.status in CurrentRecord != "Categorize" AND problem.status in CurrentRecord != "Assign" AND problem.status in CurrentRecord != "Suspended")

action.actionCondition: nullsub($G.CEOwnershipSM, true)=false and ($L.mode="close" or evaluate($L.tableAccess.update) and $L.mode~#"add") and nullsub($G.ess, false)=false
action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"nullsub($G.CEOwnershipSM, true)=false and ($L.mode="close" or evaluate($L.tableAccess.update) and $L.mode~#"add") and nullsub($G.ess, false)=false"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
action.actionCondDesc: nullsub($G.CEOwnershipSM, true)=false and ($L.mode="close" or evaluate($L.tableAccess.update) and $L.mode~#"add") and nullsub($G.ess, false)=false

action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Incident Tasks">Incident Tasks</Area><Right caption="New">new</Right></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
action.actionCondDesc: ( the "New" value in the "Incident Tasks" Security Area = true)

action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"evaluate(notes in $G.pm.environment) and nullsub($G.ess, false)=false"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
action.actionCondDesc: ( Expression: evaluate(notes in $G.pm.environment) and nullsub($G.ess, false)=false)

action.actionCondition: $G.ess="false" and category in $L.file=$G.imCategories and not (same($L.mode, "add")) and jscall("security.getToken", "Incident", "new")="true"
action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess">$G.ess</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">false</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.imCategories">$G.imCategories</VariableName></Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.mode">$L.mode</VariableName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">add</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Incident">Incident</Area><Right caption="New">new</Right></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
action.actionCondDesc: Variable $G.ess Equals false AND Category in CurrentRecord Equals Variable $G.imCategories AND Variable $L.mode Not Equals add AND new in Incident Equals true

action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="authorization"><TableName>CurrentRecordAuth</TableName><FieldName caption="Update">update</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess">$G.ess</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">false</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">Closed</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
action.actionCondDesc: ( user has "Update" authorization AND $G.ess = "false" AND problem.status in CurrentRecord != "Closed")

action.actionCondition: nullsub($G.ess, false)=false and nullsub(lioption("Knowledge Management"), false) and $isChild=false
action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"nullsub($G.ess, false)=false and nullsub(lioption("Knowledge Management"), false) and $isChild=false"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
action.actionCondDesc: ( nullsub($G.ess, false)=false and nullsub(lioption("Knowledge Management"), false) and $isChild=false )

record.updateCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="authorization"><TableName>CurrentRecordAuth</TableName><FieldName caption="Update">update</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.CEOwnershipSM">$G.CEOwnershipSM</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
record.updateCondDesc: User has 'Update' authorization AND Variable $G.CEOwnershipSM Equals true
